meta.title: Alice Mandelli - UI Developer & Designer with AI specialization
meta.description: UI Developer & Designer with over 10 years of experience. I create intuitive interfaces and innovative AI solutions for companies and startups. Portfolio featuring award-winning projects like SNAM Easy (Nielsen Norman Award 2021), Paragraph AI Journalist, and enterprise platforms.
meta.keywords: UI Developer, UI Designer, AI Strategy, User Experience, Frontend Developer, Vue.js, React, Interface Design, Nielsen Norman Award

hero.title: Alice Mandelli
hero.desc1: UI Developer & Designer specialized in creating intuitive interfaces and innovative AI solutions.
hero.desc2: Over 10 years of experience with Vue.js, React and cutting-edge technologies for enterprise projects.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: UI Developer & Designer with 10+ years of experience in enterprise projects
about.description: I'm Alice Mandelli, a UI Developer & Designer with a strong passion for creating interfaces that combine aesthetics, functionality, and AI innovation. I have worked on successful projects like SNAM Easy (Nielsen Norman Award winner), Paragraph AI Journalist, and CRM platforms for clients such as Poste Italiane, AXA, Banca Generali, and Marazzi Ceramiche.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: Projects that made a difference in the enterprise world
portfolio.description: My most significant projects that have transformed the digital experience of companies and users.

contact.title: Let's work together
contact.subtitle: Do you have an enterprise project or AI solution in mind?
contact.description: I'm always interested in new, challenging projects in the enterprise and AI world. Whether you need to develop a complex interface, improve an existing platform, or integrate AI solutions, I'm here to turn your ideas into successful digital realities.

footer.bio: Portfolio of Alice Mandelli ‚Äì UI Developer & Designer specialized in enterprise solutions and innovative AI interfaces, winner of Nielsen Norman Award 2021.

uiDevelopment.title: UI Development & Design
uiDevelopment.description: Development and design of modern interfaces using Vue.js, React and Angular. Specialized in responsive design and mobile device optimization.

aiSolutions.description: Interface design for AI applications and automation. Experience with digital workflows and process optimization.
